title: Help. Frames keep skipping
body: My ping is good but I keep skipping frames like crazy. It's affecting my gameplay. Any ideas on what to do? Using Windows 10.

replies.body:
Hmm.. It's possible that you could be running into issues with the Xbox Game Bar that had the game dvr feature enabled in some recent windows updates. To test this, you can [disable the bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) temporarily to see if anything changes.

Let me know the results.

Okay. Tried that. About to go ingame. My mouse does seem easier to use.

EDIT: Ingame, I still lag.

Since you're still experiencing frames skips after disabling the game bar, the cause is likely to be either video drivers or windows power setting related. I encourage you to take a look at our [FPS issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) that covers a lot of the common solutions for this problem.
 
Hit me up with some info on what happened after those steps.

Late reply. Had a really busy week.

Okay. Finally finished the update as well as a Windows 10 update that showed up on Thursday. Was able to run a game yesterday (Ryze Jungle) . Actually played well. I started with everyone at the fountain ( which usually doesn't happen until 30 seconds) , was easily able to press the tab button without it freezing up, and team fights weren't hectic. Plus my mouse didn't spin out of control. Was having high FPS (100, 110) as well as low pings.

Seems to be working but I'ma try a few more games.

Again, thanks for the assistance. I'ma spread the word to others if I see them.

+1
